sentences.sentence: When you grow up, your love will bloom and fructify.
sentences.translation: 人成熟一点，你的爱情便会开花结果。

sentences.sentence: Is the my ability lucky to fructify national well-known novelist?
sentences.translation: 我能有幸结实全国有名的小说家吗？

sentences.sentence: Walnut trees pass over the winter, blossom out, fructify under the rigorous weather conditions.
sentences.translation: 其树体越冬、开花、座果对气候条件要求严格。
